column4: Can SANE be used to set up a scanner server on the network that will be accessible to non-Ubuntu machines as well? I am thinking of trying to connect the scanner to my PC, which runs Ubuntu Hardy, via USB and follow the sane server instructions, but it still needs to be accessible from the 3 other unfortunate Vista machines in the office :(
do you have a Windows CD product key? borrow a disc and use your legally owned key then
Yes. Give me a minute to look it up
